original_text: He was renowned among the thirty, but he did not attain to the three. And David set him over his bodyguard.
korean_text: 삼십 명보다 존귀하나 그러나 세 사람에게는 미치지 못하였더라 다윗이 그를 세워 시위대 대장을 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: He was renowned among the thirty
but he did not attain to the three.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 세 사람에게는 미치지 못하였다.

sentences.original_text: And David set him over his bodyguard.
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗은 그를 자기 호위대 장관으로 삼았더라.
